forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds S at 40 to 55 km/h, becoming W and decreasing to 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with periods of rain. High 56F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph, becoming W and decreasing to 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two around the area early, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this evening with clearing overnight. Low 44F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 12C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 53F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 56F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low 49F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High near 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 59F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 13C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High near 55F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 12C. S winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 53F. S winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 6C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 43F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny in the morning. Increasing clouds with showers later in the day. High 53F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 53F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
